content: Netizens added: Maybe this is what everyone often calls the "post-epidemic era". All kinds of incredible behaviors during the epidemic still exist today because of interests and other aspects.

content: March 10, Nanping Street, Kunming. Owners of the unfinished Kaisa City Plaza jumped off a building to protest their rights

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The most magical patriotic news recently was born: On March 8, two branches of the Japanese convenience store chain 711 in Changzhou, Jiangsu announced that they would stop selling all Nongfu Spring related products from now on, and stated that "they will not sell products that Chinese companies promote pro-Japanese behavior." ğŸ‘

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
March 11, Tianfu 2nd Street, Chengdu. A man stabbed someone with a knife and then confronted the police outside a high-rise window.
It was reported online that the man stabbed anyone he saw in the corridor and killed three people. Another company responded that it rescued a woman covered in blood and her life is not in danger.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The downstairs perspective of the murderer confronting the police outside the high-rise window

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The location is Hengda Junlinge, Tianfu 2nd Street, Chengdu Hi-tech Zone
The pictures of the victims are quite bloody and have been mosaiced.
At least two women were stabbed. The murderer originally planned to jump off the building but was later rescued.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: March 11, Yangzhou, Jiangsu. Yangzhou Powerlong City was left unfinished, and the owners gathered at the sales office to protest their rights. Later, the owners rushed to the door of the local government agency to protest their rights. During the period, a dispute broke out and some owners were dragged by auxiliary police and unidentified people.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: March 10 (Released) Xi'an. The Greenland Unicorn Park was left unfinished. The building was originally scheduled to be delivered on July 30, 2023, and there is still no sign of construction on site. Owners gathered downstairs of the unfinished building to defend their rights, and some owners hung banners on the building.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On March 11, in Yihuang County, Fuzhou, Jiangxi Province, the exterior wall of a building fell off, and the falling rubble and bricks hit several cars parked on the pedestrian street below. The accident caused no casualties, and the relevant departments are investigating the cause of the accident.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On March 10, in Lianyungang, Jiangsu, a street office hung a banner that read "Zero tolerance for illegal immigration crimes, severe crackdown on all illegal immigration crimes."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
A local netizen left a message in the comment area saying, "There are many people here who go abroad to work without going through formal channels. The passports in our county have been suspended." 
Another netizen whose IP shows that he is from the United States said, "Many Jiangsu people I know here are from Lianyungang, Jiangsu, and Donghai."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: https://t.co/JElirszBEG

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On March 9, the Heilongjiang Provincial Public Security Department's Confidentiality Bureau required that all public security system cadres at or above the section level use telephones or internal collaborative office software from now on.
Work content, confidential documents, and confidential screenshots are not allowed to be transmitted using Internet social software. Some messages are conveyed verbally, and governance is done without a trace. At the same time, all work group chat records in the public security system are required to be cleaned up regularly.
It is reported that the local government is also preparing confidentiality contracts for auxiliary police and other external personnel.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Live confrontation video

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On the afternoon of March 7, a reed bush next to the playground of Guangxi Normal University (Guilin) Yanshan Campus caught fire.
This is not the point. The point is that the school began to track down all students who posted videos that day and threatened students to "not forward videos and photos that damage the school's image... regret it because of a momentary pleasure and a sense of presence."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Subsequent update: The murderer was not rescued and was confronting the police outside the window on the 29th floor from 1:30 pm to now.
There were blue vests at the scene to maintain order, and many people sat in the Starbucks opposite to watch the excitement.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: At 19:55, Chengdu Public Security Bureau issued a police report saying that the suspect had been taken into custody. Two women were injured.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On March 11, Shandong Tai'an Huatong Company was suspected of exploding.
Videos released by locals showed that a large number of people gathered outside the Tai'an Huatong Group on Monday. A local blogger said that they are currently waiting for official notification to see how the government will deal with it. In order to avoid a run on the bank, depositors whose deposits expire in the near future will be remitted.
As of now, Shandong Tai'an Huatong Holding Group has not responded to this matter

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On March 11, some depositors discussed on social media that they could not withdraw the money they deposited in Shandong Tai'an Huatong. One account left a message under each comment saying that the matured part had been paid, and Huatong was not irresponsible.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On March 11, in Zhengzhou, Henan, a woman posted a video saying that after having a lumbar disc herniation surgery at the Henan Provincial Third People's Hospital, she developed urinary and bowel problems, numbness on both sides of her thighs, and could not stand on tiptoe. She went to the hospital to defend her rights but was held down by several security guards.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: From March 11 to 15, China, Russia and Iran will conduct joint exercises near the Gulf of Oman.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Since March 8, Hohhot has experienced a large-scale water outage.
The local water supply company "Chunhua Water" once issued an announcement stating that at around 18:00 on March 8, due to fluctuations in the power grid, the water supply pipeline of the second phase of the Yellow River diversion suddenly ruptured, causing the Jinhe Water Treatment Plant to reduce production, and it is being repaired overnight.
On March 10, a staff member of "Chunhua Water" told reporters that the current difficulty of repairing is too great and there is no exact time for restoring water supply.
On March 11, the media reported that the repair work of the Jinhe Water Treatment Plant's water inlet pipeline has been completed, and the gates have begun to open for water injection. The affected communities are expected to resume normal water supply this afternoon.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: At around 8 p.m. on March 11, an explosion occurred at an electronics factory in Liuhe Town, Qichun County, Huanggang City, Hubei Province, with flames shooting into the sky.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The picture of the local hospital emergency building circulated on the Internet

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On March 11, it was reported online that an explosion occurred at the Datianwan Asphalt Station in Jishou, Xiangxi, Hunan. Videos shot by local netizens showed thick smoke rising from the scene, and someone filmed the injured being sent for treatment at the entrance of the hospital.
As of this posting, the number of casualties is unknown.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Local netizens said that the accident happened in a factory area. At first, a small chemical plant exploded at around 7:30 p.m., and then the boilers of other factories around were affected and exploded again. 
Some residents nearby reported that there was irritating gas at the scene that made them unable to open their eyes, and they have been evacuated. The casualties were mainly employees of the chemical plant.
